refsection.title: Description
refsection.para:
This block writes data to MicroDAQ volatile memory. Block can be used to pass data from Standalone or Ext application to Scilab or external application.
User has to provide 'Start index' which points to beginning or memory area. The 'Size' block parameter defines overall size of the memory which block reads data from. 'Vector size' defines size of signal read by block. The 'Overwrite' parameter determines if memory data will be overwritten when end of the buffer is reached. If 'Overwrite' parameters is enabled block works as a circular buffer.
In order to read data written by this block mdaq_mem_get() toolbox function can be used.

member.para: input(1) - data to write to MicroDAQ memory

simplelist.member: mdaq_mem_read : Reads data from MicroDAQ memory
